arts.ttl: 'Buzzing' James Carragher hopes he's given Wigan Athletic boss a real problem
arts.sum: James Carragher admitted he was 'absolutely buzzing' after his first senior goal set Wigan Athletic on the way to three big points against Bristol Rovers.

arts.ttl: Player ratings - Wigan Athletic v Bristol Rovers - ‘Work rate must be up there with anyone who's played for the club’...Paul Kendrick's ratings
arts.sum: Paul Kendrick runs the rule over the Wigan Athletic side that beat Bristol Rovers 2-0 at the Brick Community Stadium and delivers his report card.

arts.ttl: REACTION: Wigan Athletic boss hails 'most controlled performance' against Bristol Rovers
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney reckoned Wigan Athletic's 2-0 victory over Bristol Rovers was 'one of the most controlled performances we've had since I've been here'.

arts.ttl: REPORT: Wigan Athletic 2 Bristol Rovers 0 - No Gas panic as Tics get back to winning ways
arts.sum: A goal in either half from James Carragher and Jonny Smith saw Wigan Athletic return ways thanks to a well-deserved 2-0 victory over Bristol Rovers at the Brick Community Stadium.

arts.ttl: Wigan claim straightforward victory over Bristol Rovers
arts.sum: James Carragher and Jonny Smith netted for the Latics.

arts.ttl: Tributes after passing of former Wigan Athletic and Manchester United hero
arts.sum: Former Wigan Athletic and Manchester United goalkeeper Dave 'Pop' Gaskell has died at the age of 84.

Wigan are not clear of relegation just yet after suffering a shock home defeat to struggling Burton on Tuesday. The gap to the bottom four is a cushty nine points, but 11 defeats already this season s...

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic: Four changes in our expected team v Bristol Rovers!
arts.sum: Paul Kendrick runs the rule over the Wigan Athletic squad and predicts the 11 men who Shaun Maloney will select to start against Bristol Rovers at the Brick Community Stadium.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic to make history with Everton next month
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic will be part of his hostory by providing the first official opposition at Everton’s new stadium.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic: The 12th Man - From Socrates quotes to free pies...another regulation week at Latics
arts.sum: Our panel of Latics experts assess a disastrous home defeat to rock-bottom Burton Albion, ahead of Saturday’s ‘Bring a Friend For Free’ clash against Bristol Rovers...with the possibility of distinct a free pie for those quick enough...
